content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining Setup at (-19, -50) and (-15, -50)
Two identical mining setups consisting of:
- Burner mining drills at (-19, -50) and (-15, -50) mining iron ore
- Wooden chests at (-18.5, -48.5) and (-14.5, -48.5) collecting the mined ore
Both drills are operational with coal fuel and mining iron ore

### Copper Ore Mining Setup at (-28, -61)
Mining setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61) mining copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5) collecting the mined ore
Drill is operational with coal fuel and mining copper ore

### Iron Plate Smelting Setup at (0,0) and (2,0)
Complex smelting setup with:
- Two stone furnaces at (0,0) and (2,0)
- Input inserter system:
  - Wooden chest at (-2.5, 0.5) with burner inserter at (-1.5, 0.5) feeding first furnace
  - Wooden chest at (4.5, 0.5) with burner inserter at (3.5, 0.5) feeding second furnace
- Output inserter system:
  - Burner inserter at (0.5, 1.5) extracting from first furnace to chest at (0.5, 2.5)
  - Burner inserter at (2.5, 1.5) extracting from second furnace to chest at (2.5, 2.5)

### Copper Plate Smelting Setup at (-6, 0)
Simple smelting setup with:
- Stone furnace at (-6, 0) smelting copper ore into plates

### Research Setup at (10.5, 0.5)
- Lab at (10.5, 0.5) for conducting research (currently unpowered)

# ERROR TIPS

### Technology and Recipe Availability Errors
- Research automation technology before attempting to craft assembling machines
- Ensure all required recipes are unlocked before attempting to craft items
- Complex items like labs require multiple sub-components - plan the manufacturing chain

### Resource/Item Availability Errors
- Ensure required items are in inventory before placing entities
- Gather raw resources like wood that cannot be crafted
- Make sure to have fuel (coal) available before attempting to insert it into burner entities

### Entity Placement Errors
- Stay within maximum placement distance (10 tiles) from player position
- Check for conflicting entities or terrain before placing new entities
- When placing entities next to each other, ensure proper spacing and valid positions
- Verify resource patches exist when placing mining drills

### Inserter Setup Issues
- When placing inserters next to buildings, use appropriate spacing to avoid conflicts
- Ensure both pickup and drop positions have valid container entities
- Add fuel to burner inserters before expecting them to operate

### Power System Issues
- Ensure power generation is set up before placing power-dependent entities like labs
- Build complete power infrastructure (offshore pump, boiler, steam engine) before connecting electrical devices
